meta.title: Voira — AI Call Assistant for Scam Protection
meta.description: Voira answers missed calls with AI, detects scam signals, and delivers instant summaries + recommended actions. Built for telcos and call protection platforms at scale.

hero.headline: Let AI handle missed calls — safely.
hero.subheadline: Voira answers when users don't pick up, detects scam signals, and delivers a call summary + recommended actions in ~2 seconds.

points.title: Users ignore unknown calls.
